page.title: 04LIVING IN A TOWER BLOCK
page.content: Mrs Sanders lives on the{fourteenth} floor of a{sixteen}storey block of flats. She has lived there for five years with her husband and two sons and she likes it very much. She enjoys the view from her verandah. She can see Strathclyde Park, the Duchess Park and Fir Park. She has a tiny garden on her verandah where she grows flowers, beetroot, parsley and lettuce. Living in a{Tower Block}does have some disadvantages. The lift sometimes takes a long time to come and in strong winds it can sway alarmingly. Occasionally passers-by use the lift as a{public toilet. }When people are moving into or out of the block, they have to dismantle large items of furniture which are too big for the lift. The residents are not allowed to keep{cats}or{dogs}which need walks.
